name: Quarter Horse Racing
description: This game is a simulated betting game.  Players use game money to place bets on Quarter Horse races.  The game provides the ability to study the horses and learn about horse and jockey characteristics.  Additional clues are provided throughout the game to improve one's "luck" and to increase one's betting funds.  Spend a day at the races, talk to people and place some bets.  It's all about the thrill of victory.
